summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4314 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 3529 lux), dew point temperature (up 2.8°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, pleasant humidity levels and gentle light winds are expected. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Similar weather conditions should remain.
